title: The Dark Passenger - Joshua Thomas.epub
description:
Edwin doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t know it yet, but heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s being hunted. 

At the bottom of a crater, surrounded by steep cliffs, Edwin was born in a lonely, isolated village, a place where outsiders aren't welcome and any mention of the supernatural is forbidden--and feared. 

Fifteen years later, Edwin has done his best to blend in, but itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s becoming ever harder to hide his mahr--a small and strange creature made of black smoke. To Edwin, the mahr is a constant source of consternation and annoyance, and he would like nothing more than for it to disappear forever. But to those who hunt him, the mahr is more than it appears, and they will do whatever it takes to have it. 

But Edwin isn't the only one in his village with secrets. His best friend, Walt, has a few that will change the life of every person Edwin has ever known. Walt is the key to unlocking Edwin's own great destiny... if Edwin can survive the encounter.
